WRITING.TEXT: I honestly don't know how to explain it better but I'll try.. Computer, seemingly, randomly reboots if I manually shut the screens off using the power buttons. But if I leave the screens on (the screens still never sleep as my settings do not permit it), my computer does not reboot.

Well on my 19th (legal drinking age in my province), my mom and her gf took me out for drinks. Which was pretty cool as my mom has been a bartender most her life and got me to have a bunch of different shots. I also may not be too normal, as I am a momma's boy and don't have or care for having a lot of friends.

My first and only credit card I got from the bank I go through (RBC here in Canada). It was just a simple credit card that gives me points back on every purchase, which is what I recommend. I have really good credit while having the credit card and they would just offer me increases on my credit card. (Started at $2000, currently at $14500.) The only thing I would think to worry about is making sure it is paid off before the interest takes effect (I believe it's usually a 21 day grace period to pay it off before you have to pay interest on what you owe). As for customer service, I have never had any issues with my card where I have needed customer service so I don't have any complaints there.
Even with your edits, I would look at the credit cards that the bank you go through offers. I definitely recommend just getting one that gives you points back. Unless you travel a lot and can get a travel points card. Although, someone may know more as I've never had a credit card from any other company. I just find it very convent to be able to pay it just from online banking, which my bank has an app for.
Probably get gonorheara, too.

I had one quite frequently when I was younger, haven't had it in about 10 years though. It was always about the apocalypse and I was the last person alive. Usually woke up pretty soon after it so I don't remember many details. Besides everything was burning and red and black.
Well that probably took the spring out of his step.

WRITING.TITLE: Computer restarts unless screens are on
WRITING.TEXT:
I have double and triple checked my power settings on my pc and as far as I can tell, it shouldn't be doing this.
My pc is in my room and I have 2 screens, when I go to bed I shut off both screens. Every time I wake up and go on my pc, I have to log back in and every program I had open is closed.
Although, I have used my pc before going to work, and left my screens on and when I come home from work it is just as it was. I am not bad with computers and usually know what to do or where to look when I have issues. But I have not been able to solve this one at all.
Any help is appreciated!

http://www.saketekilla.com/2014/07/02/matthiasbrown-bringingbackoldschooltechniques/
This is the best answer I could find.

WRITING.TITLE: LFParty to train with
WRITING.TEXT: Hey, I'm a 210 NL in Windia that is looking for someone/a party to train with during the 2x coming up in 45 mins. Or even advice on where the best place to look for a party is. I only have 70 arc. Any help would be greatly appreciated. I'm an on and off player so I don't know a lot about the current MapleStory.

I maxed out my stamina as quickly as I could. I find I used my stamina more than I cared about hearts. Especially since I have a inventory full of food that replenishes all my hearts plus gives extra temp hearts.
I love books like that. This is going to be one of the first I check out for sure!
OOH. Just thought of a game I fricken absolutely love playing high. Trials Fusion or anything else like it (that's good). It's just a motorbike riding obstacle course.
